column17: Damage Scale: ATC-13. 340 URM buildings investigated.

column16: EEFIT report + Cambridge Earthquake Impact Database
column17: ND: No damage; CRD: Chimney or roof tile damage	; VD: Damage to veneer; FD: Foundation damage; PC: Partial collapse; CC: Complete collapse. Survey areas: Riccarton High School recording station (RHSH), Christchurch Cashmere High School recording station (CCHS), and Heathcote Valley School recording station (HVSC). 204 URM buildings investigated.
The damage level observed is classified according the ATC-13 damage scale. 368 buildings investigated.
Local authorities carried out the Building Safety Evaluation (BSE) procedure (i.e., tagging). 833 RC buildings investigated.
